mapper.insert: insert into item values(item_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{contents}, TO_CHAR(#{price},'999,999,999'), #{seller}, default, default, #{imagePath1}, #{imagePath2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imagePath3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category}, default)
mapper.select: select count(*) from item where category=#{value}
select * from (select row_number() over(order by seq desc) as rown, item.* from item) where rown between #{start} and #{end}
select * from (select row_number() over(order by seq desc) as rown, item.* from item where category=#{category}) where rown between #{start} and #{end}
select * from item where seq in (#{value, jdbcType=number})
